revised_title: William Cecil Dampier: A Life in Science and Public Service
tldr: William Cecil Dampier was a prominent British scientist and academic, known for his work in the fields of physics, genetics, and agricultural economics. He made significant contributions to the understanding of electrolytic solutions, the history of science, and the development of agricultural research in the UK. Dampier was also actively involved in public service, holding various posts in agricultural organizations and being elected a Fellow of the Royal Society.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Biographies
